content: this primer contains the essential information required to work patterns using the breakaway crochet method for a video tutorial please go to https //youtu be/zd5audj0mkq included is the breakaway training wheels project which is a placemat consisting solely of the same very small motifs the project presents a very efficient way of joining the motifs in a continuous manner and gives an opportunity to practice the new techniques since new and extensive information is presented this pattern is geared for those committed to reading through the preparatory sections before the project is attempted it is also intended for crocheters with at least moderate crochet experience definitely not for beginners for more info on this technique and to keep updated with new pattern releases check out the breakaway crochet method facebook page 1 the placemat is approximately 16 x 11 in size if another size is required the pattern is easily modified the placemat shouldn t require any blocking it naturally lies very flat even without additional edgings gauge is not important for this project but if another yarn weight is used then for best results use the hook size that is recommended on the yarn label 1 https //www facebook com/breakawaycrochet/
